briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Bimekizumab in Adult Korean Study Participants With Moderate to Severe Plaque Psoriasis
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Group Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Bimekizumab in Adult Korean Study Participants With Moderate to Severe Plaque Psoriasis
summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of bimekizumab compared with placebo.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With a Psoriasis Area and Severity Index 90 (PASI90) Response at Week 16
